ygData.subject: Re: The Mechwarriors crash (search parties, go!)
ygData.msgSnippet: No it will be Zoids: Chaotic Century if I have anything to say about it.  I m thinking Van and Raven use the technology from their zoids to create the Liger

No it will be Zoids: Chaotic Century if I have anything to say about 
it.  I'm thinking Van and Raven use the technology from their zoids 
to create the Liger Zero and the Berserk Fury, and give it to their 
kids.  Finally, something in which the Ultimate Xes are piloted by 
real warriors, instead of a 10 year old barely out of dipers, and 
some junk dealer, who only win because of the Organoid system.  Jamee 
would have made a better star for that show (later on anyway), he was 
unstopable WITHOUT a system that makes all the decesions for you.  
The freaken' Liger didn't NEED a pilot, Bit just got in the way, and 
it was the Liger's Organoid system that beat the Berserk Fury, not 
Bit.  The kid had already proven he was better than Bit in a normal 
Zoid.  But if it's Van and Raven's kids duking it out, you KNOW it's 
more than the organoid system.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> No... it will not be silver Surfer. It will be the denizens of 
fraggle rock. 
> Cower in fear now. Cower in fear damn you!
